metadata.title: CVE-2019-9458 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Android kernel in the video driver there is a use after free due toa race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
